trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Tio-Reeq is wrinkling his nose in displeasure.
TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TODO_00<tab>Pick bunches of Kholusian sage near the Clave.
TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the bunches of Kholusian sage to Tio-Reeq.
TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TODO_02<tab>Use the sachet of Kholusian sage at the designated location.
TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TODO_03<tab>Report to Tio-Reeq.
TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TIOREEQ_000_001<tab>Ugh... Oh, my poor, sensitive nose! Do you not smell that awful <var 1A 02 /var>stench<var 1A 01 /var>!?

TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TIOREEQ_000_002<tab>What we require here is a strategically placed sachet of ground Kholusian sage. The trouble is, I'm not quite willing to die in the process of obtaining said herb.

TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TIOREEQ_000_003<tab>But what of you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>? There is sage aplenty near the Clave should the promise of reward overshadow any fear you might have of stabbing tooth and rending claw. Two generous bunches should suffice!
TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TIOREEQ_000_004<tab>You'll find patches of sage over to the west, near the Clave. Two large handfuls of the herb would be most appreciated!
TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TIOREEQ_000_010<tab>How fared your harvesting efforts?
TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TIOREEQ_000_011<tab>Yes, this is a goodly amount. My thanks! A moment while I prepare an experimental sachet...
TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TIOREEQ_000_012<tab>I'll just grind these up...add a sprinkle of this...a dash of that...
TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TIOREEQ_000_013<tab>And 'tis done!
TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TIOREEQ_000_014<tab><sniff> Ah, 'tis akin to inhaling a springtime breeze! I must begin producing these fair-scented pouches in bulk!

TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TIOREEQ_000_015<tab>You, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>, have the privilege of putting my aromatic creation to the test. Place one of my sachets behind this foul-smelling shack, and inform me of the results!
TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TIOREEQ_000_016<tab>A proper test of my sachets is in order! And the backside of this malodorous lean-to should provide the perfect testing ground!
TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>The rank fumes permeating the air are slowly replaced by a pleasant, refreshing scent...
TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TIOREEQ_000_030<tab>Did my sachet prove the victor in that contest of fragrances?
TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TIOREEQ_000_031<tab>Well, that is satisfying to hear! I shall continue manufacturing these pockets of sage and proceed with secreting them about the place.
TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TIOREEQ_000_032<tab>The thing of it is, the folk of Gatetown often paw through the refuse discarded by the free citizens of Eulmore.

TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TIOREEQ_000_033<tab>Such salvaged items have, however, spent no short span of time moldering amongst actual garbage... Thus the offensive odor I have been forced to endure. But no longer!
TEXT_LUCKZA011_03353_TIOREEQ_000_034<tab>Thanks to you, my olfactory senses will be spared. Pray accept this token for your trouble!
